Comment: The ID number of the stock location.
The name of the stock location.
This field contains 'Y' is the location is currently active.
The date and time when the location was initialised for stocktake.
The date and time when count sheets were printed for the location.
The date and time when counted quantities were keyed for the location.
The date and time when stock transactions were uploaded to the Stock ledger.
This field contains the custom SQL filter defined for the location, if there is one.
